accessActivation: Activation of access to the register
activationBannerText: Have you received a code from your school to activate your access to the register?
activationCodeDescription: Enter the activation code you received at school. Enter one word into each field.
activationEmailAddressDescription: Enter the email address you want to use to log in.
activationEmailAddressConfirmationDescri: To make sure that entered email address ({emailAddress}) belongs to you, we sent a message to this address. To complete the activation, open the link that is in this message.
activationExistingUserPasswordDescriptio: It seems that you already have an account on the school register. Enter the password for your account.
activationNewUserPasswordDescription: Now set a password for your account.
forgotPasswordFormDescription: Enter your email address, we will send a message with more instructions.
forgotPasswordSetNewDescription: Now set a new password for your account.
incorrectCredentialsError: Email address or password is incorrect.
logInFormDescription: Enter your email address and password.
messageSent: The message has been sent to the mailbox {emailAddress}, in the message there is a link to set a new password.
passwordMaxLengthError: The password must contain at most 128 characters.
passwordMinLengthError: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
repeatPasswordError: The password must be the same in both fields.
requiredEmailAddressError: You need to enter your email address
requiredPasswordError: You need to enter your password
sendMessageAgainHint: Didn't receive your message? We can send it again.
